tidbits.title: Volcanic Island
tidbits.description: Montserrat is a volcanic island in the Caribbean, known for the Soufri√®re Hills volcano eruption in 1995, shaping its recent history.

tidbits.title: Cultural Blend
tidbits.description: The island has a cultural blend influenced by African, Irish, and British heritage, reflected in its music, festivals, and cuisine.

tidbits.title: Recovery and Resilience
tidbits.description: Montserrat is in a phase of recovery post-eruption, with ongoing efforts to rebuild and revitalize, showcasing the islanders' resilience.
